acne.description: Inflammation of oil glands and hair follicles
acne.consult_doctor_when: Severe acne, scarring, or no improvement

eczema.consult_doctor_when: Bleeding skin or signs of infection

psoriasis.consult_doctor_when: Joint pain or large body area affected

scabies.symptoms: Severe itching, tiny bumps or burrows
scabies.consult_doctor_when: No relief after treatment or family spread
